title: La Liga North America CEO Boris Gartner
itunes:title: La Liga North America CEO Boris Gartner
description:
Hosts Michael Barr and Scarlet Fu are joined by La Liga North America CEO Boris Gartner to talk about the start of the new season, soccer's growing popularity in the US, and how Apple TV sitcom Ted Lasso has helped.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
